title: Deepinder Goyal starts health-focused personal venture ‘Continue’
description: In a post on microblogging platform X, Goyal wrote, "It is, as of now, my personal health and wellness team, entirely funded by me, which tracks and researches how to keep me running at my peak performance.”
content: Zomato founder and CEO Deepinder Goyal has launched ‘Continue’, a personal venture focused on longevity and performance optimisation through health and mental wellness tracking. In a post on microblogging platform X, Goyal wrote, "It is, as of now, my personal health and wellness team, entirely funded by me, which tracks and researches how to keep me running at my peak performance.”
